announcements.title: Some minor rule changes
announcements.description:
Lots of Openplanet plugins have been released lately. But some are or can be behaved as additional help. We are therefore going to ban some Openplanet plugins from the challenge.
The only plugin that we are currently going to ban is the [Predictor](https://openplanet.nl/files/160), the reasons for this ban are simple: This plugin predicts your time on finish, but it will help you a lot if you have the author time even before you have the last checkpoint, which gives you a phenomenal lead.
We hope you will understand this choice.

announcements.title: Happy new year!
announcements.description: We wish you all a Happy New Year! The plugin will have some changes in the next few months: We will try to optimize this plugin as well as possible. In addition, ManiaEchange has been improved and, you may have noticed, the map switch became faster and faster. We hope you'll like it :)

challenge: **Get as many Author medals as possible in 60 minutes!**
You can have one free skip per run
As soon as you get the Gold medal you are allowed to skip the map.
If the Author Time (AT) of the map is over 3 minutes, you can skip.
If the map has an impossible Author time, you can skip. (e.g. broken PF maps or cheated validation.)
Ghosts other than personal best are not allowed but GPS is allowed (to not give club members an advantage).
Cam 7 is allowed while the timer runs.

If you have already beaten Gold medal time or AT before (also on own maps), beat the respective time again. It is highly recommended to use a medals window plugin in Openplanet to see the medal times. The checkpoint counter plugin is also allowed.
You can skip Skin/Mod downloads. (Turning off will not affect since you're in solo and not in server)
survival: **Finish as many Author times before the timer runs out!**
**An author time adds 3 minutes to the timer.**
**Maximum timer is set at 15 minutes. Skipping removes one minute to its maximum.**
You can pause the timer anytime you want, as long as the pause is recorded
If the map has an impossible Author time, you can use the free skip. (e.g. broken PF maps or cheated validation.)
Ghosts other than personal best are not allowed but GPS is allowed (to not give club members an advantage).
Cam 7 is allowed while the timer runs.
If you have already beaten AT before (also on own maps), beat the respective time again. It is highly recommended to use a medals window plugin in Openplanet to see the medal times.
You can skip Skin/Mod downloads. (Turning off will not affect since you're in solo and not in server)
